about_the_game:
Neurosis is an intense horror-thriller where your decisions can save—or cost—lives. Step into the shoes of a young psychiatrist running an online support group with deeply troubled patients. Each session reveals unsettling connections, buried secrets, and the shadow of a manipulative psychopath hiding among them.

Dive into a gripping narrative inspired by real psychological challenges and therapeutic practices. Your choices will define relationships, uncover truths, and determine how many lives can be saved. With themes of trust, betrayal, and survival, Neurosis blends a detective’s sharp mind with the haunting uncertainty of the human psyche.

Will you unmask the hidden predator before it's too late, or become their next victim? In Neurosis, the answers lie in your hands.
